long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
> Effortlessly search, organize, and export your X/Twitter bookmarks with AI-powered categorization - no Premium account required.

## Core features

1. Twitter Bookmark Smart Search

Say goodbye to endless scrolling! Our intelligent search feature allows you to quickly locate any saved tweet. Whether it's keywords, usernames, or dates, simply input the relevant information to precisely find your target content among vast bookmarks.

2. Twitter Bookmark Folder + AI Smart Categorization
Transform your chaotic bookmarks into a well-organized knowledge base. We not only support manual creation of custom folders but also introduce a revolutionary AI Smart Categorization feature:

Automatic Classification: AI algorithms automatically analyze your bookmark content and categorize it into relevant topic folders.
Tag Generation: Automatically generate relevant tags for each bookmark, facilitating quick identification and retrieval.
Personalized Recommendations: Based on your categorization habits, AI learns and recommends more suitable classification methods for you.
Dynamic Adjustment: As your usage habits change, AI continuously optimizes the classification system, ensuring it always meets your needs.
This AI-assisted organization method makes your bookmark management both intelligent and personalized, greatly improving work and study efficiency.

3. Twitter Bookmark One-Click Download
Want to permanently save important tweets? Our download feature makes this effortless. With just a few clicks, you can save selected bookmarks in various formats to your local device, ensuring access to these valuable resources anytime, anywhere.

4. Twitter Bookmark Bulk Export
Need to migrate your Twitter bookmarks between different platforms? Our export feature provides the perfect solution. Supporting multiple common formats, it allows you to easily transfer bookmarks to other applications or share with others.

Whether you're a social media professional, market researcher, or casual Twitter enthusiast, our Twitter Bookmark Management tool can greatly enhance your user experience. The AI Smart Categorization saves you substantial organizing time, making management unprecedentedly simple. Try it now and experience AI-powered Twitter bookmark management, making your information organization smarter and more efficient than ever!

## July 3, 2024 Update

## June 28, 2024 Update

Workflow Support

We're excited to announce that you can now use Twillot as a workflow in X/Twitter now.
Know more about workflow, check it out https://twillot.com/docs/workflows/guide.

### May 29, 2024 Update

Omnibox Support

We're excited to announce that you can now use tt for quick searches in the Omnibox. To use this feature, follow these steps:

- Type tt in the Omnibox.
- Press the Tab key.
- Input your keyword.

By doing this, you'll be taken directly to Twillot search results, enhancing your search efficiency.

## Features

**Lightning-Fast Search**
  - Find any bookmark in an instant.
  - Search by date, author, folder, time range, tag, or keyword.
  - No more endless scrolling!
  
**Privacy-First**
  - Your data is your business.
  - All bookmarks are stored locally in your browser.
  - Ensures complete privacy and unmatched search speed.
  - No server, no worries.
  
**Folder Organization**
  - Organize your bookmarks into folders for maximum control.
  - Available even if you're not a Twitter Blue subscriber.

**Unlock Data Insights**
  - Discover your bookmarking habits with insightful visualizations.
  - Track your interests, identify trends, and gain a deeper understanding of your saved content.
 
  
**Enhanced Reading Experience**
  - Long-form tweets and rich media are beautifully reformatted for optimal readability.
  - Makes it easier than ever to enjoy longer content on Twitter.
